import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import api from "./service/api"; import "./global.css"; import "./App.css"; import "./Sidebar.css"; import "./Main.css"; function App() { const [github_username, setGithubUsername] = useState(""); const [techs, setTechs] = useState(""); const [latitude, setLatitude] = useState(""); const [longitude, setLongitude] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition( position => { const { latitude, longitude } = position.coords; setLatitude(latitude); setLongitude(longitude); }, err => { console.log(err); }, { timeout: 30000 } ); }, []); async function hendleAddDev(e) { e.preventDefault(); const response = await api.post("/devs", { github_username, techs, latitude, longitude }); console.log(response.data); } return (
Cadastrar
setGithubUsername(e.target.value)} />
